abstract: Juli Inkster, fourth two-time captain of United States Solheim Cup team, is introduced at Des Moines Country Club, where 2017 matches will be held.
lead_paragraph: Juli Inkster was introduced as captain of the United States Solheim Cup team at Des Moines Country Club.
snippet: Juli Inkster was introduced as captain of the United States Solheim Cup team at Des Moines Country Club.
